title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: When including a library in a report design, I see that the report design stores an absolute path instead of a relative path.
EB: The report design should generate and store the relative path when including a library.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design.
3. Include a library from a different location.
4. Check the path of the included library in the report design to see if it is saved as a relative path.
